text: American Truck Simulator is a truck simulator game made by SCS Software. It was announced in September 2013. It was released on 2 February 2016 for Microsoft Windows, Linux, and macOS. The game is similar to Euro Truck Simulator 2 where players drive semi-trailer trucks and deliver cargo to their destinations, but instead the game is set in the United States and features American trucks and different locations across the country. The game has sold over 2 million copies on Steam. ==References== Category:2016 video games Category:Simulation video games Category:MacOS games Category:Windows games
title: American Truck Simulator
